scripts.start: concurrently "npx babel -w src --out-dir dist --verbose" "npm run sass:watch"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npx babel src --out-dir dist --verbose && NODE_ENV=production npx node-sass src/scss -o dist/css && cd docs/code && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.copy-files: sed 's/"private": true,//g' package.json > dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/
scripts.local: npm run build && npm run copy-files
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run copy-files && cd dist && npm publish
